mapper.select: select nn.academy_no as academyNo, nn.academy_title as academyTitle, nn.academy_start as academyStart, nn.academy_end as academyEnd, nn.academy_photo as academyPhoto, nn.academy_teacher as academyTeacher, nn.academy_place as academyPlace, nn.academy_price as academyPrice, nn.academy_detail as academyDetail, nn.academy_category as academyCategory from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from(select * from academy order by academy_no desc)n)nn where rnum between 1 and #{reqPage}
